ValidationRule.description: Do not allow changes to a stage on an active pipeline
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR ( AND( ISCHANGED( sf_devops__Branch__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(sf_devops__Branch__c))) ) , ISCHANGED( sf_devops__Environment__c ) , ISCHANGED( sf_devops__Next_Stage__c ) , ISCHANGED( sf_devops__Versioned__c ) ), sf_devops__Pipeline__r.sf_devops__Activated__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot modify a Pipeline_Stage on an activated Pipeline.
